attributes.action: U.K. Armed Forces Veterans objection to Tony Blair receiving a Knighthood
attributes.additional_details: We ask the Members of Parliament to honour the Armed Forces Covenant and respect Veterans and those serving to block the possibility of Tony Blair receiving a Knighthood.
attributes.background: Prevent Tony Blair receiving a Knighthood on behalf of U.K. Armed Forces

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions about honours or appointments, including requests for individuals to be given or not given particular honours.
